name: Kate
greetingText: Your name is really cool, and it's funny how it rhymes with mine.
wishText: I have a feeling we could click. Wanna grab coffee? ;)
text1: I know you're still healing and I don't want to pressure you but...
textInChatBox: I like you and want to know you better blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you love it.
